title: Participatory democracy weighted by population
subtitle: Based on the expert assessments and index by V-Dem. It combines information on suffrage, the freedom and fairness of elections, freedoms of association and expression, as well as the extent to which citizens can engage in regional and local government, civil society organizations and direct democracy. It ranges from 0 to 1 (most democratic).
sourceDesc: OWID based on V-Dem (v13); Gapminder (v6); HYDE (v3.2); UN (2022)

relatedQuestions.text: How do different approaches score democracy across the world?
